author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and meticulously designed the sound for this captivating video showcasing Old Egypt 1920, taking you deep into the bustling streets of Cairo with its timeless charm and authentic atmosphere. The film also offers an extended glimpse at the archaeological sites and the majestic pyramids, revealing places and perspectives rarely seen before, immersing you in a unique journey through history.

video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔sound design added only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source from: Prelinger Archives (Rick Prelinger)

Many thanks to Mr. Rick Prelinger for his hard work and dedication
title: Old Egypt 1920s in color [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
